title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API; pull and run Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama, sync & async APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, admin, model manager).

title: ollama-cli (mikejgray/ollama-cli)
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation memory and themes.

title: ollama-copilot (samdammers/ollama-copilot)
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm (terrytangyuan/ollama-helm)
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rust (pepperoni21/ollama-rust)
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET client for Ollama with chat & embed endpoints; NuGet package.

title: ollama-discord (rizerphe/ollama-discord)
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers via Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack (andrewkroh/ollama-slack)
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with Socket-Mode support.

title: ollama-obsidian (sytone/ollama-obsidian)
summary: Obsidian plugin to query local Ollama models from within notes.

title: ollama-haystack (anakin87/ollama-haystack)
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-lmstudio-bridge (lmstudio-ai/ollama-lmstudio-bridge)
summary: Adapter letting LMStudio consume Ollama-served models via OpenAI-style endpoints.

title: ollama-nix (nixified-ai/ollama-nix)
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible builds of Ollama and common models.

title: ollama-dagger (grouville/dagger-ollama)
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing.

title: ollama-rag-app (dsdanielpark/ollama-rag-app)
summary: Streamlit app template for RAG using Ollama embeddings & chat.

title: ollama-model-importer (thomasantony/ollama-model-importer)
summary: CLI tool to convert HuggingFace models into Ollama Modelfile format.
